// Multimach CCX
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "For PvP I'm interested in iron reach, but the heavy drop in stability puts me off. I know aggressive frame smgs have low stability by default but those were an exception, not the trend to be like. Kill clip will be my top choice when paired with quickdraw or dynamic sway reduction to hit your shots." Recommended MW: Stability.|tags:pvp,controller

Feeding Frenzy is your best bet in PvE activities though in lower-levelled content subsistence is uninteresting shout. Especially for the “bullet hose” of pulse rifles." Recommended MW: Reload.|tags:pve,controller

// The Time-Worn Spire
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "For PvP there’s a lot less interesting combos. Quickdraw will bring up that average (for it’s class) handling to near max. Iron grip will also give you that much needed stability alongside the bonuses from your masterwork and ricochet rounds. This will be a consistent rapid-fire pulse over a lethal one." Recommended MW: Range.|tags:pvp,controller
dimwishlist:item=3593598010&perks=2405638014,1885400500,706527188,11551321

// The Messenger
//notes:pandapaxxy (PvP / Controller): "Desperado and rapid hit truly are a match made in heaven. Headseeker is my personal choice as I prefer a neutral weapon to anything else, but desperado on more than Redrix is a great move. [...] This is gonna be a dominant high-impact pulse for as long as it remains not sunset." Recommended MW: Stability.|tags:pvp,controller
